name: Snow Problem (Geistder)
description:
WASD to move, SPACE to jump and climb

Christmas is ruined! All of the presents fell out of Santa's sleigh when delivering them to the family on top of the mountain. Can their Snowman they made possibly get all the presents and reach the top?

BIG BUG: Restarting doesn't work, you'll have to relaunch the exe

Programming: Evan Dawson-Greer (https://itch.io/profile/geistder)

Art: Zach Carter (https://zcarter.itch.io/)

Music: Justin Williams(https://soundcloud.com/oregonaddict)
